title: Red Sky at Night Lovers' Delight
description: Lovely and spirited Kate Warrender had embarked on a dangerous impersonation - and now her family and her home were in jeopardy.In this colorful new Regency novel, author Jane Aiken Hodge unfolds a lively tale of romance and derring-do - of a courageous young woman who finds herself caught up in the plots and perils of England on the brink of revolution - and the head-spinning entanglements of lovers in pursuit...
author: Jane Aiken Hodge
